<h1 align="center">
  Personal Website for Akma
</h1>

This is a personal portfolio created for an aspiring photographer. 

## 🧐 What's inside?
This portfolio briefly introduces Akma and her works. Images are uploaded as query images with GraphQL using [GatsbyImage](https://www.gatsbyjs.com/docs/working-with-images/) element.

## 💫 Check our Akma's social media!
